events.name: Introducing You To Your Family History
events.summary: We will meet with your ancestors, so you can ask them in person instead of guessing from what records remain.

events.name: The Power of Knowledge in Self Defense
events.summary: A course studying the combat methods of past practitioners.

events.name: Pizza Party
events.host: A Lady with an Alligator Purse
events.summary: Get ready for the biggest party of your life!

events.name: Murder Mystery
events.summary: I know who you are, and where and how you will do it. It will be murder... by death!

events.name: Emotional Empowerment Through Music
events.summary: Working together to increase skills in music and supporting each other as we build ourselves up.

events.name: Book Safety, lesson 3: Titles to Avoid
events.summary: Learn to recognize some of the books that are best avoided by their title alone. True, you should generally not judge a book by its cover alone, but it can give you a good starting point. Take this for example, which literally cost the last reader their sanity to read the first chapter: 'An Inexhaustively Comprehensive Guide on the Topic of Why I Shouldn't Have Written This Book, Vol. 7, 158th edition reprint'. Seriously, please be safe and don't read such harmful material.

events.name: Children Community Reading
events.summary: Let your young ones enjoy relaxing together for an hour each week. A lovely book and good friends are always something to treasure.

events.name: A New Beginning
events.date: The first Monday after your 10th birthday (if you are late, even if years late, you won't get first pick)
events.summary: Choose your partner for a grand adventure!

events.name: Second Breakfast
events.summary: Actually, it's going to be at the park nearby. Be sure to bring some to share! Being heroes isn't as well-paying as one would hope.

events.name: The End of Time
events.time: Exactly 5 minutes and 32 seconds before you clock out from work
events.summary: Honestly, just listen to the podcast: 'The End of Time, and Other Bothers', it is so good!

events.name: Babblefish babbling in my ear and why you want one too
events.time: Noon or five minutes after tea, whichever comes last
events.summary: A short course that will be most enlightening. Bring your towel, or at least know where it is.

events.name: Sleighbell Craft Night
events.summary: We just need some help with our project. Nothing unusual here, children.

events.name: Hot Air Balloon Safety and Guidelines
events.host: Oscar Zoroaster Phadrig Isaac Norman Henkle Emmannuel Ambroise Diggs
events.summary: Learn from an experienced balloonist that ended up stranded in a magical land for many years, due to not being as careful with his flight plans as he might have been.

events.name: The Litster Sibling Bash!
events.summary: Sadly, it is a mystery because only the Litster Siblings are invited. But if you can best me in a Smash Bros. Showdown, you can win a pass.
